Uses of Package
com.fxgraph.edges

  • Packages that use com.fxgraph.edges 
    Package Description
    com.fxgraph.edges  
  • Classes in com.fxgraph.edges used by com.fxgraph.edges 
    Class and Description
    AbstractEdge
    Abstract edge superclass with basic implementations of IEdge methods.
    AbstractEdgeGraphic
    An abstract edge graphic superclass with a group for basic edge graphics, a text label, and an arrow for showing direction.
    CorneredEdge
    An AbstractEdge implementation that segments an otherwise diagonal edge into one horizontal and one vertical segment, having up to one corner.
    CorneredEdge.EdgeGraphic
    AbstractEdgeGraphic implementation for a cornered edge.
    CorneredLoopEdge
    AbstractEdge implementation for representing an edge with two corners that connects a cell to itself.
    CorneredLoopEdge.EdgeGraphic
    AbstractEdgeGraphic implementation for displaying a cornered loop edge in a graph.
    CorneredLoopEdge.Position
    Defines the four sides of a cell bounding box that a cornered loop edge can extend from, as well as grouping them into vertical and horizontal positions.
    DoubleCorneredEdge
    An AbstractEdge implementation that displays an otherwise diagonal edge as a chain of three vertical and horizontal component segments:

    HVH or VHV (H=horizontal, V=vertical)
    DoubleCorneredEdge.EdgeGraphic
    AbstractEdgeGraphic implementation for displaying a double cornered edge in a graph.
    Edge
    An implementation of AbstractEdge with a straight connecting line graphic and a label.
    Edge.EdgeGraphic
    Fully defined, optionally directed, labeled, straight line edge graphic for display in a graph canvas.
    MessageEdge
    A fully defined AbstractEdge implementation specialized for representing sequence diagram messages.
